properties.description: This Pipeline can be used to send Email Alerts

activities.description: This is to send error email

body.value:
@concat('{"Subject": "', if(equals(toUpper(pipeline().parameters.status), 'F'), 'FAILED - ', 'SUCCESSFUL - '), pipeline().parameters.jobGroupName, ' (Job Group ', pipeline().parameters.jobGroup, if(greater(length(trim(pipeline().parameters.jobNum)),0), concat(', Job Number ', pipeline().parameters.jobNum), ''), if(greater(length(trim(pipeline().parameters.tableName)),0), concat(', Table ', pipeline().parameters.tableName), ''), ')",', '"Message": "Pipeline Name: ', pipeline().parameters.pipelineName, '
', 'Status: ', if(equals(toUpper(pipeline().parameters.status), 'F'), 'FAILED', 'SUCCESSFUL'), '
', 'Job Type: ', pipeline().parameters.jobType, '
', 'Job Group Criticality: ', pipeline().parameters.jobGroupCriticality, '
', 'Technical Dependencies: ', pipeline().parameters.TechDependencies, '
', 'Business Dependencies: ', pipeline().parameters.BizDependencies,'
', 'Time: ', utcnow(), '

', 'Error Message: ', pipeline().parameters.errorMsg, '

', 'For more details, please visit: ', pipeline().parameters.url, '
', '", "EmailTo": "', pipeline().parameters.emailIDs, '"}')
